Package com.project.couponProject3.services

Interface AdminService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminServiceImpl
    public interface AdminService
    Contains all the method of admin actions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCompany​(Company company)
      Add the new company instance to DB if company's name or email not already exist in DB.
      void addCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Add the new customer instance to DB if customer's email not already exist in DB.
      void deleteCompany​(int companyID)
      Delete a company from DB including company's coupons and coupons' purchases
      void deleteCustomer​(int customerID)
      Delete a customer from DB including the coupons' purchases
      java.util.List<Company> getAllCompanies()
      Get all companies instances from DB.
      java.util.List<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Get all customers instances from DB.
      Company getOneCompany​(int companyID)
      Get a company instance from DB.
      Customer getOneCustomer​(int customerID)
      Get a customer instance from DB.
      void updateCompany​(Company company)
      Update a company that already exist in DB.
      void updateCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Update a customer that already exist in DB.

    • Method Detail

      • addCompany

        void addCompany​(Company company)
         throws CompanyException
        Add the new company instance to DB if company's name or email not already exist in DB.
        Parameters:
        company - company instance to add to DB
        Throws:
        CompanyException - if company's name or email already exist in DB

      • updateCompany

        void updateCompany​(Company company)
            throws CompanyException
        Update a company that already exist in DB. Company's id and name are not updatable.
        Parameters:
        company - company instance with the new values
        Throws:
        CompanyException - when company id not found in DB or a try to change company name or a try to change company email to an email of other company in the system.

      • deleteCompany

        void deleteCompany​(int companyID)
            throws CompanyException
        Delete a company from DB including company's coupons and coupons' purchases
        Parameters:
        companyID - delete by company ID
        Throws:
        CompanyException - if company's ID not found in DB

      • getAllCompanies

        java.util.List<Company> getAllCompanies()
        Get all companies instances from DB.
        Returns:
        List of companies or null if no company found

      • getOneCompany

        Company getOneCompany​(int companyID)
        Get a company instance from DB.
        Parameters:
        companyID - by company ID
        Returns:
        company instance from DB or null if no company found

      • addCustomer

        void addCustomer​(Customer customer)
          throws CustomerException
        Add the new customer instance to DB if customer's email not already exist in DB.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer instance to add to DB
        Throws:
        CustomerException - if customer's email already exist in DB

      • updateCustomer

        void updateCustomer​(Customer customer)
             throws CustomerException
        Update a customer that already exist in DB. Customer's id is not updatable.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer instance with the new values
        Throws:
        CustomerException - when customer id not found in DB or a try to change customer email to an email of other customer in the system.

      • deleteCustomer

        void deleteCustomer​(int customerID)
             throws CustomerException
        Delete a customer from DB including the coupons' purchases
        Parameters:
        customerID - delete by customer ID
        Throws:
        CustomerException - if customer's ID not found in DB

      • getAllCustomers

        java.util.List<Customer> getAllCustomers()
        Get all customers instances from DB.
        Returns:
        List of customers or null if no customer found

      • getOneCustomer

        Customer getOneCustomer​(int customerID)
        Get a customer instance from DB.
        Parameters:
        customerID - by customer ID
        Returns:
        customer instance from DB or null if no customer found
